dining.Name: Cotswold Square Extending Dining Table

This 4 seater square extending table is another of our best sellers with an easy to open butterfly central leaf converting it into a larger dining table when needed.  It comes in a light oak finish with a chunky, square edged design. Order now for a quick delivery.

This extendable square Dining Table from our Cotswold Range is the ultimate in luxury, this table is beautifully crafted, expertly made with quality joints and it's thick 45 mm top and legs are carefully finished with a high quality lacquered finish which seals the wood thereby helping to protect it from dents and stains. It also complements and draws out the natural beauty of the oak wood grain, creating the warm and rich effect as pictured. It will enhance the look of any room and will be complimented by other pieces within the same range. This extendable Dining Table makes a beautiful and luxurious centre piece to any Dining room and offers an unrivalled sense of understated luxury and subtle sophistication. Its effortlessly practical, and easy to extend when you have company using a simple Butterfly extension system. It stands on stylish tapered legs  and ships "partially assembled".

The Cotswold Range makes a beautiful and luxurious addition to any room in your house

A beautiful and contemporary range of high grade chunky Oak dining room furniture.

This modern stylish Oak extra large dining table is perfect for those of us who love to entertain but don't always have the space for a very large table.

This table is very easy to extend, with two separate inserts that are stored under the table and easy to slot in giving you maximum seating flexibility for up to 12 people. With no inserts, 6 can sit comfortably around this beautiful oak table.

Grampian Oak range is chunky with 70mm Oak tops that have been given a light lacquer finish to help protect from bumps and spills without altering the beautiful naturally light Oak finish.

Don't forget to add the matching Grampian Oak Chairs!

Due to the size of the extra large table it has a steadying brace fitted at the bottom of the table.   This table has two extending leaves stored internally giving you the option of three sizes in one table.

dressing-tables.Name: Rutland Dressing Table
dressing-tables.Body:

It is expertly made with dovetailed joints and is carefully treated with a layer of superior pine wax, which seals the wood thereby helping to protect it from dents and stains. It also complements and draws out the natural beauty of the wood grain, creating the warm and rich effect as pictured. 

It stands on a sturdy plinth and the three spacious solid drawers have quality wooden knobs to add understated detail. The Rutland Solid Pine Dressing Table has been beautifully crafted in 100% solid Pine and with it's superb workmanship is guaranteed to remain beautiful and to last for many years to come due to its high-quality finish and sturdiness. This dressing table ships "fully assembled". The Rutland Solid Pine Dressing Table makes a beautiful and luxurious addition to any bedroom!  This dressing table can be complemented by our Rutland Stool and Mirror.

This mirror can be free standing or fixed to the top of the Dressing table with the quality brackets provided. It also tilts to ensure you can check that you're looking good from every angle. This Vanity Mirror is expertly made and is carefully treated with a layer of superior pine wax, this seals the wood thereby helping to protect it from dents and stains. It also complements and draws out the natural beauty of the wood grain, creating the warm and rich effect as pictured.

The Rutland Solid Pine Vanity Mirror has been beautifully crafted in 100% solid Pine and with it's superb workmanship is guaranteed to remain beautiful and to last for many years to come due to its high-quality finish and sturdiness. It will enhance the look of any room and will be complimented by other pieces within the same range. This extendable Dining Table makes a beautiful and luxurious centerpiece to any Dining room and offers an unrivalled sense of understated luxury and subtle sophistication. This tall chest just right for that tight space. It comes in a light oak finish with 5 drawers with dovetailed drawer fronts and twist pegs fitted to the drawer backs for added safety and a choice of either traditional wooden or contemporary metal knobs.  Part of our best selling range.  Order now for a quick delivery.

Dimensions: W55 x D42 x H120

  • We import direct from our suppliers to save you money!
  • Choice of wooden or metal knobs
  • Supplied fully assembled
  • Superior lacquered finish
  • Dovetailed drawer fronts
  • Twist pegs on drawer backs for safety

test-products.Name: Cotswold 1.4 Extending Dining Table
test-products.Body:
This popular extending dining table with an easy to open butterfly leaf action enables it to be extended to 2 metres for when those extra guests come around.  This best selling range comes in a  contemporary style  light oak finish with neat square edges. Order now for a quick delivery.

This table is beautifully crafted, expertly made with quality joints and it's thick 45 mm top and legs are carefully finished with a high quality lacquered finish which seals the wood thereby  helping to protect it from dents and stains. It also complements and draws out the natural beauty of the oak wood grain, creating the warm and rich effect as pictured. It will enhance the look of any room and will be complimented by other pieces within the same range. This extendable Dining Table makes a beautiful and luxurious centerpiece to any Dining room and offers an unrivalled sense of understated luxury and subtle sophistication. Its effortlessly practical, and easy to extend when you have company using a simple butterfly extension system. It stands on stylish tapered legs and ships "partially assembled".

Dimensions: W90 x L140-200 x H78

test-products.Name: Cotswold 4ft 6 Bed Frame
test-products.Body:
This solid oak framed bed with oak finished inserts is part of our best selling range.  Its solid, robust construction requires only minimal, easy assembly but if assistance is required then please contact our telephone helpline on the number at the top of the Home page.  Why not combine it with one of our coil sprung or pocket sprung mattresses?  Order now for a quick delivery.

This 4'6 bed from our Cotswold range is the ultimate in luxury, its timelessly elegant design ensures that you will sleep in style. This bed is expertly made and finished with a high quality lacquered finish. This bed will enhance the look of any bedroom and will be complimented by other pieces within the same range. The Cotswold Oak Bed has been beautifully crafted with its superb workmanship and is guaranteed to remain beautiful and to last for many years to come due to its high-quality finish and sturdiness. This bed makes a great bed for your guest accommodation, but it also makes a great bed for a child's room.

It will provide better support for you and your mattress with independent wooden slats, and comes with a 2 year workmanship guarantee. Your new bed frame ships "partially flat packed" making the home assembly process quick and easy. The Cotswold Oak Bed makes a beautiful and luxurious addition to any bedroom!

Dimensions: W150 x L212 x H115

PLEASE NOTE SPECIFICATION CHANGE HEADBOARD NOW SUPPLIED SLATTED NOT SOLID AS SHOWN IN PICTURE.

tv-units.Body: This fully assembled large TV cabinet comes in a light oak finish with rounded corners and side details, 2 small cupboards with removable and adjustable shelf both ends and 2 large openings in the centre section for your Sky or other media devices.   Holes are pre-drilled at the back of the open section for plugs/wires.

wardrobes.Name: Rutland Small Wardrobe
wardrobes.Body:
Cupboard or mini wardrobe? You can take the shelves out and use the fitted hanging rail for smaller storage and hanging space. Keep the shelves in and remove the rail to give you loads of storage space on 3 surfaces. 

The Rutland Solid Pine 2 Door Wardrobe from our Rutland range is massively affordable but still retains that quality feel about it. This smaller sized Wardrobe has been beautifully crafted in 100% solid Pine and with it's superb workmanship is guaranteed to remain beautiful and to last for many years to come due to its high quality finish and sturdiness.

With it's 2 adjustable/ removable shelves and hanging rail it makes an easy solution to everyday storage problems. Each Wardrobe is carefully treated with a layer of superior pine wax, which seals the wood thereby helping to protect it from dents and stains. It also complements and draws out the natural beauty of the wood grain, creating the warm and rich effect as pictured. This Wardrobe will enhance the look of any bedroom and will be complemented by other pieces within the same range. The Wardrobe ships "flat packed" making the home assembly process quick and easy. The Rutland Solid Pine Wardrobe makes a beautiful and luxurious addition to any bedroom!

Dimensions: W86 x D48 x H139

Each wardrobe is carefully treated with a layer of superior pine wax, which seals the wood thereby helping to protect it from dents and stains. wardrobes.Body:
Three doors with a 3 drawer base and a strong hanging rail throughout. Masses of storage in this one. The main feature of any bedroom.  This solid, chunky, traditional range comes fully assembled in a medium oak finish with rounded off corners and attractive metal drop handles and matching door knobs.

Dimensions: W153cms x D57cms x H195cms

wardrobes.Name: Rustic Double Wardrobe
wardrobes.Body:
A two door, 1 drawer wardrobe supplied with a strong hanging rail. Supplied in two boxes for easy assembly.  This solid, chunky, traditional range comes fully assembled in a medium oak finish with rounded off corners and attractive metal door knobs. 

Dimensions: W107cms x D57cms x H195cms

wardrobes.Name: Cotswold Triple Wardrobe
wardrobes.Body:
Need more storage space for your clothes? This roomy wardrobe comes with 3  massive dovetailed drawers and is supplied with either contemporary metal or traditional wooden knobs on the drawers.   It comes in a light oak finish with chunky square edges with the base section ready assembled and the top section with easy assembled panels.  A best seller.  Order now for quick delivery.

Dimensions: W150 x D60 x H190

wardrobes.Name: Cotswold Double Robe 2 Drawers
wardrobes.Body:
This practical double robe comes with two useful drawers at the base, giving loads of storage space.   Choose between wooden or contemporary metal knobs to suit your room. It comes in a light oak finish with chunky square edges with the base section ready assembled and the top section with easy assembled panels. Part of our best selling range.  Order now for a quick delivery.

Dimensions: W110 x D60 x H190

wardrobes.Name: Camden Clear Oak Double Wardrobe
wardrobes.Body: This wardrobe comes in a light oak finish with sliding doors, making it ideal for narrow rooms. The bottom section comes fully assembled and has 2 large drawers which are made using traditional dovetails. The top sliding section comes with recessed handles in a knock down form for easy access and assembly and the drawer section comes with button brushed satin chrome knobs.

wardrobes.Name: Camden Putty Double Waderobe with 2 sliding doors & 2 draws
Mon Chique Triple Wardrobe
wardrobes.Body:
Easy assembly with this wardrobe. It comes in two boxes and has a simple bolt together system. This popular contemporary range has an attractive oak top and a modern off white finish with neat rounded corners and contemporary cup handles on the drawers.  Order now for a quick delivery. 

Dimensions: W146cms x D57cms x H191cms

waverley.Name: Waverley 2 Drawer Bedside
waverley.Body:
This budget light oak compact size 2 drawer bedside table with brushed chrome knobs is also useful in the lounge or dining room as a lamp table or just as an occasional table with handy storage.

Dimensions:  W35cm x D40cm x H57cm.

waverley.Name: Waverley Bookcase
waverley.Body:
This budget light oak tall narrow bookcase with 4 fully adjustable and/or removable shelves is ideal for CDs, DVDs and books.

Dimensions:  W40cm x D25cm x H130cm

waverley.Name: Waverley Lamp Table with Drawer
waverley.Body:
This budget light oak compact lamp table with  small handy drawer with a brushed chrome knob and useful fixed shelf can also be used as a handy bedside table or side table in the lounge/dining room.

Dimensions: W36cm x D40cm x H47cm

waverley.Name: Waverley Square Dinning Table
waverley.Body:
This budget light oak dining table is ideal for the smaller home.

Dimensions:  W75cm x D75cm x H77cm

waverley.Name: Waverley TV Cabinet
waverley.Body:
This budget light oak small TV cabinet with handy cupboard with fixed shelf inside and brushed chrome knob, has two open sections for your DVD player or Sky box etc.  It comes with two pre-made holes cut in the back for your cables.   A practical small, neat unit ideal for most homes.

Dimensions: W90cm x D45cm x H50cm

waverley.Name: Waverley Compact Sideboard
waverley.Body:
This budget  light oak compact sideboard with handy drawer and fixed shelf in the cupboard space comes with brushed chrome knobs. Ideal for hallways but also a practical space filler in any room in your home.

Dimensions: W75cm x D33cm x  H75cm.

waverley.Name: Waverley Nest of 2 Tables
waverley.Body:
This budget light oak compact nest of two tables can be used anywhere in your home, either together or separately for use as a side or lamp table.   

Dimensions: W45cm x D35cm x H50cm

waverley.Name: Waverley Corner TV Cabinet
waverley.Body:
This budget light oak corner tv unit with handy drawer with brushed chrome knob and two open spaces is perfect for your DVD player or sky box etc.  It's neat design allows it to fits in the smallest of corners and also makes an ideal unit for a lamp.  It comes with cutouts already made for cables in the back.

Dimensions:  W90cm x D45cm x H65cm

wine-cabinets.Body:
You can store up to 16 bottles in this unit and with a large drawer above for your corkscrew this unit will look elegant in any room.  This solid, chunky, traditional range comes fully assembled in a medium oak finish with rounded off corners and attractive metal drop handles.
